text: Sorry, for the delay on the hook stuff. I didn't really realize that was for 1.6. Tbh that seems like something that should have some time to bake on master. Is there anything blocked on that? 'll make it prio to review it.

elements.text: Sorry, for the delay on the hook stuff. I didn't really realize that was for 1.6. Tbh that seems like something that should have some time to bake on master. Is there anything blocked on that? 'll make it prio to review it.

text: Honestly, it’s not critical, so if you’re too pressed for time, it can wait.  I do think it will help packages like CUDA though, and I’d like to get it in so that we can have it in the ecosystem and see how packages adopt it, so that we can refine its behavior with things like PackageCompiler in 1.7
